item.title: Welcome To Bold Pastel
item.description: What is Bold Pastel We make web software. We do it because we enjoy making good software. We are learning by seeking, exploring and ending up in blunders. And so if we fail and if we learn, it will never be for want of boldness but because of it. Attempting to make epic software, one bit at a time. What do we do? We are building micro applications on the web to solve practical problems that we see and encounter.
